content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":253552,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t陣地内の魔軍を撃破し進む","translatedEnglishLine":"Defeat the demon army within the base and advance."},{"lineNumber":253553,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t偶然来ていたルメイは慌てる","translatedEnglishLine":"Lumei, who came by chance, panics."},{"lineNumber":253554,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t本物の魔物大将軍ルメイが居た","translatedEnglishLine":"The real Demon Great General Lumei was there."},{"lineNumber":253555,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t戦闘開始","translatedEnglishLine":"Battle begins."},{"lineNumber":253556,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔物大将軍ルメイを倒した","translatedEnglishLine":"Defeated the Demon Great General Lumei."},{"lineNumber":253557,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tヘルマンの各地で人類軍は反撃開始","translatedEnglishLine":"The human army begins counterattacks throughout Helman."},{"lineNumber":253558,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tついに魔軍を駆逐した","translatedEnglishLine":"Finally, the demon army was exterminated."},{"lineNumber":253559,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス城、司令部","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance Castle, Headquarters."},{"lineNumber":253560,"originalJapaneseLine":"戻ってクリームとセックス","translatedEnglishLine":"Return and have sex with Cream."},{"lineNumber":253561,"originalJapaneseLine":"クリームは嫌がる、そんな約束した覚えはありません。","translatedEnglishLine":"Cream resists, saying she doesn't remember making such a promise."},{"lineNumber":253562,"originalJapaneseLine":"ガチャと鍵を閉めるランス","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance locks the door with a click."},{"lineNumber":253563,"originalJapaneseLine":"ひ、人を呼びますよ","translatedEnglishLine":"I-I'll call someone."},{"lineNumber":253564,"originalJapaneseLine":"呼べばいい、だが、俺とクリームちゃんの逢瀬を邪魔する奴は斬る","translatedEnglishLine":"Call if you want, but anyone who interrupts Cream-chan and me will be cut down."},{"lineNumber":253565,"originalJapaneseLine":"わ、私　危険日なんです","translatedEnglishLine":"I-It's my dangerous day (fertile period)."},{"lineNumber":253566,"originalJapaneseLine":"じゃ子供を授けてやろう","translatedEnglishLine":"Then I'll give you a child."},{"lineNumber":253567,"originalJapaneseLine":"いやです、それだけは絶対にいやです","translatedEnglishLine":"No, absolutely not, not that."},{"lineNumber":253568,"originalJapaneseLine":"わがままな女だな、じゃ口で我慢してやる","translatedEnglishLine":"You’re such a selfish woman. Fine, I'll satisfy you with my mouth."},{"lineNumber":253569,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tヘルマン地域で反撃戦の様子１","translatedEnglishLine":"Counterattack status in Helman region 1."},{"lineNumber":253570,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t追い詰められた魔軍はダウンホール作戦を実施","translatedEnglishLine":"Cornered demon army implements the Downhole Operation."},{"lineNumber":253571,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t小部隊により殺戮作戦","translatedEnglishLine":"Massacre operation by small units."},{"lineNumber":253572,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tヘルマン地域で反撃戦の様子２","translatedEnglishLine":"Counterattack status in Helman region 2."},{"lineNumber":253573,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t作戦を察知したヘルマン軍、参謀真田透琳","translatedEnglishLine":"Helman forces detect the operation, staff officer Torin Sanada."},{"lineNumber":253574,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t敵の作戦の裏をかく、この機会に魔軍を殲滅する","translatedEnglishLine":"Outsmart the enemy's operation and annihilate the demon army on this opportunity."},{"lineNumber":253575,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tヘルマン地域で反撃戦の様子３","translatedEnglishLine":"Counterattack status in Helman region 3."},{"lineNumber":253576,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔軍の作戦が開始された、村々が襲われる","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon army's operation begins, villages are attacked."},{"lineNumber":253577,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tが、真田の作戦で被害は最小限に抑えられていた","translatedEnglishLine":"However, thanks to Sanada’s plan, damage was kept to a minimum."},{"lineNumber":253578,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tアミトス、ロレックスの主力軍が出撃した","translatedEnglishLine":"The main forces of Amitos and Rolex sortie."},{"lineNumber":253579,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tヘルマン地域で反撃戦の様子４","translatedEnglishLine":"Counterattack status in Helman region 4."},{"lineNumber":253580,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tアミトス、ロレックスが次々の魔物陣地を攻略していく","translatedEnglishLine":"Amitos and Rolex capture demon bases one after another."},{"lineNumber":253581,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔物大将軍ルメイはそれでも当初の作戦を固持する","translatedEnglishLine":"Nevertheless, Demon Great General Lumei holds to the original plan."},{"lineNumber":253582,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tヘルマン地域で反撃戦の様子５","translatedEnglishLine":"Counterattack status in Helman region 5."},{"lineNumber":253583,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t侵攻してきた部隊を止める真田、そこにシーラが闘将を率いて現れた","translatedEnglishLine":"Sanada stops the invading unit; then Sheila appears leading the fighting generals."},{"lineNumber":253584,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tその頃、魔軍本陣にアミトス、ロレックス隊が迫っていた","translatedEnglishLine":"Meanwhile, Amitos and Rolex troops were approaching the demon army's main camp."},{"lineNumber":253585,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t人破壊爆弾が届いた、迫った人類軍でなく都市に使う事にしたルメイ","translatedEnglishLine":"The human-destruction bomb arrived; Lumei decided to use it on the city, not the advancing human army."},{"lineNumber":253586,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tヘルマン地域で反撃戦の様子６","translatedEnglishLine":"Counterattack status in Helman region 6."},{"lineNumber":253587,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t人破壊爆弾を使う為にエノラゲイと移動するルメイ","translatedEnglishLine":"Lumei moves with Enola Gay to use the human-destruction bomb."},{"lineNumber":253588,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tだが、パットンに迎撃され倒される","translatedEnglishLine":"However, Patton intercepts and defeats him."},{"lineNumber":253589,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tついに魔軍を殲滅","translatedEnglishLine":"Finally, the demon army is annihilated."},{"lineNumber":253590,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tヘルマンは解放された","translatedEnglishLine":"Helman has been liberated."},{"lineNumber":253591,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t空飛ぶランス城","translatedEnglishLine":"The flying Lance Castle."},{"lineNumber":253592,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランスと闘神ゼータの語らい","translatedEnglishLine":"A conversation between Lance and the Fighting God Zeta."},{"lineNumber":253593,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tもうひとつの闘神を拾いに行く","translatedEnglishLine":"Going to pick up another Fighting God."},{"lineNumber":253594,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t地図、ヘルマン東部","translatedEnglishLine":"Map, eastern Helman."},{"lineNumber":253595,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tシグマが墜落した場所、中に入ります","translatedEnglishLine":"The place where Sigma crashed, entering inside."},{"lineNumber":253596,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t闘神都市の中をうろうろ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Wandering inside the Fighting God city."},{"lineNumber":253597,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tうん、ちょっと懐かしいぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm, this is a bit nostalgic."},{"lineNumber":253598,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t聖骸闘将との戦闘の前","translatedEnglishLine":"Before the battle with the Holy Corpse Fighting General."},{"lineNumber":253599,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t聖骸闘将との戦闘の後","translatedEnglishLine":"After the battle with the Holy Corpse Fighting General."},{"lineNumber":253600,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tあれらは壊れているので仲間に出来ない、無理","translatedEnglishLine":"They are broken, so they cannot be recruited, impossible."},{"lineNumber":253601,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t動かずに埋まっているシグマを見つける","translatedEnglishLine":"Find Sigma, motionless and buried."},{"lineNumber":253602,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t今は何も出来ない","translatedEnglishLine":"Cannot do anything now."},{"lineNumber":253603,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t宝箱だんごが聖櫃を運んでいる・・逃げて行く","translatedEnglishLine":"The treasure chest dumpling is carrying the ark... it runs away."},{"lineNumber":253604,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tあれがシグマ本体だ、捕まえられん","translatedEnglishLine":"That's the real Sigma; can't catch it."},{"lineNumber":253605,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tまた宝箱だんごを見つけるが・・逃げて行く","translatedEnglishLine":"Find another treasure chest dumpling... it runs away."},{"lineNumber":253606,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tくそっ、素早い。","translatedEnglishLine":"Damn, it's fast."},{"lineNumber":253607,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tやっぱりランスでも無理かと・・パットンが言ってしまうと","translatedEnglishLine":"When Patton says, 'As expected, it's impossible even for Lance...'"},{"lineNumber":253608,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t意地になるランス","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance becomes stubborn."},{"lineNumber":253609,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t宝箱だんごを見つける、慎重に近寄り飛びかかり捕まえる","translatedEnglishLine":"Find the treasure chest dumpling, carefully approach, leap and capture it."},{"lineNumber":253610,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tやったーーー","translatedEnglishLine":"Got itーーー!"},{"lineNumber":253611,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランス、それ違う、普通の宝箱だんごだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance, that's different, it's just a normal treasure chest dumpling."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 陣地内の魔軍を撃破し進む
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Defeat the demon army within the base and advance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 偶然来ていたルメイは慌てる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lumei, who came by chance, panics.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本物の魔物大将軍ルメイが居た
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The real Demon Great General Lumei was there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘開始
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battle begins.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物大将軍ルメイを倒した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Defeated the Demon Great General Lumei.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマンの各地で人類軍は反撃開始
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The human army begins counterattacks throughout Helman.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ついに魔軍を駆逐した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Finally, the demon army was exterminated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城、司令部
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance Castle, Headquarters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戻ってクリームとセックス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Return and have sex with Cream.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クリームは嫌がる、そんな約束した覚えはありません。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cream resists, saying she doesn't remember making such a promise.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガチャと鍵を閉めるランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance locks the door with a click.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひ、人を呼びますよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I-I'll call someone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 呼べばいい、だが、俺とクリームちゃんの逢瀬を邪魔する奴は斬る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Call if you want, but anyone who interrupts Cream-chan and me will be cut down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わ、私　危険日なんです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I-It's my dangerous day (fertile period).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: じゃ子供を授けてやろう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then I'll give you a child.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いやです、それだけは絶対にいやです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, absolutely not, not that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わがままな女だな、じゃ口で我慢してやる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You’re such a selfish woman. Fine, I'll satisfy you with my mouth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマン地域で反撃戦の様子１
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Counterattack status in Helman region 1.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 追い詰められた魔軍はダウンホール作戦を実施
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cornered demon army implements the Downhole Operation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 小部隊により殺戮作戦
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Massacre operation by small units.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマン地域で反撃戦の様子２
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Counterattack status in Helman region 2.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 作戦を察知したヘルマン軍、参謀真田透琳
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Helman forces detect the operation, staff officer Torin Sanada.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 敵の作戦の裏をかく、この機会に魔軍を殲滅する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Outsmart the enemy's operation and annihilate the demon army on this opportunity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマン地域で反撃戦の様子３
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Counterattack status in Helman region 3.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍の作戦が開始された、村々が襲われる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army's operation begins, villages are attacked.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: が、真田の作戦で被害は最小限に抑えられていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, thanks to Sanada’s plan, damage was kept to a minimum.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アミトス、ロレックスの主力軍が出撃した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The main forces of Amitos and Rolex sortie.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマン地域で反撃戦の様子４
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Counterattack status in Helman region 4.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アミトス、ロレックスが次々の魔物陣地を攻略していく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Amitos and Rolex capture demon bases one after another.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物大将軍ルメイはそれでも当初の作戦を固持する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nevertheless, Demon Great General Lumei holds to the original plan.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマン地域で反撃戦の様子５
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Counterattack status in Helman region 5.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 侵攻してきた部隊を止める真田、そこにシーラが闘将を率いて現れた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sanada stops the invading unit; then Sheila appears leading the fighting generals.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、魔軍本陣にアミトス、ロレックス隊が迫っていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, Amitos and Rolex troops were approaching the demon army's main camp.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人破壊爆弾が届いた、迫った人類軍でなく都市に使う事にしたルメイ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The human-destruction bomb arrived; Lumei decided to use it on the city, not the advancing human army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマン地域で反撃戦の様子６
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Counterattack status in Helman region 6.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人破壊爆弾を使う為にエノラゲイと移動するルメイ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lumei moves with Enola Gay to use the human-destruction bomb.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、パットンに迎撃され倒される
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, Patton intercepts and defeats him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ついに魔軍を殲滅
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Finally, the demon army is annihilated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマンは解放された
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Helman has been liberated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 空飛ぶランス城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The flying Lance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスと闘神ゼータの語らい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A conversation between Lance and the Fighting God Zeta.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もうひとつの闘神を拾いに行く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Going to pick up another Fighting God.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地図、ヘルマン東部
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Map, eastern Helman.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シグマが墜落した場所、中に入ります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The place where Sigma crashed, entering inside.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 闘神都市の中をうろうろ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wandering inside the Fighting God city.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うん、ちょっと懐かしいぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, this is a bit nostalgic.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 聖骸闘将との戦闘の前
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Before the battle with the Holy Corpse Fighting General.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 聖骸闘将との戦闘の後
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After the battle with the Holy Corpse Fighting General.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれらは壊れているので仲間に出来ない、無理
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are broken, so they cannot be recruited, impossible.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 動かずに埋まっているシグマを見つける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Find Sigma, motionless and buried.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今は何も出来ない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cannot do anything now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 宝箱だんごが聖櫃を運んでいる・・逃げて行く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The treasure chest dumpling is carrying the ark... it runs away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれがシグマ本体だ、捕まえられん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's the real Sigma; can't catch it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: また宝箱だんごを見つけるが・・逃げて行く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Find another treasure chest dumpling... it runs away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: くそっ、素早い。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Damn, it's fast.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やっぱりランスでも無理かと・・パットンが言ってしまうと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Patton says, 'As expected, it's impossible even for Lance...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 意地になるランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance becomes stubborn.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 宝箱だんごを見つける、慎重に近寄り飛びかかり捕まえる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Find the treasure chest dumpling, carefully approach, leap and capture it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やったーーー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Got itーーー!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス、それ違う、普通の宝箱だんごだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance, that's different, it's just a normal treasure chest dumpling.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 陣地内の魔軍を撃破し進む
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Defeat the demon army within the base and advance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 偶然来ていたルメイは慌てる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lumei, who came by chance, panics.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本物の魔物大将軍ルメイが居た
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The real Demon Great General Lumei was there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘開始
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battle begins.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物大将軍ルメイを倒した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Defeated the Demon Great General Lumei.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマンの各地で人類軍は反撃開始
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The human army begins counterattacks throughout Helman.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ついに魔軍を駆逐した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Finally, the demon army was exterminated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城、司令部
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance Castle, Headquarters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戻ってクリームとセックス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Return and have sex with Cream.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クリームは嫌がる、そんな約束した覚えはありません。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cream resists, saying she doesn't remember making such a promise.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガチャと鍵を閉めるランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance locks the door with a click.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひ、人を呼びますよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I-I'll call someone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 呼べばいい、だが、俺とクリームちゃんの逢瀬を邪魔する奴は斬る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Call if you want, but anyone who interrupts Cream-chan and me will be cut down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わ、私　危険日なんです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I-It's my dangerous day (fertile period).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: じゃ子供を授けてやろう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then I'll give you a child.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いやです、それだけは絶対にいやです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, absolutely not, not that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わがままな女だな、じゃ口で我慢してやる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You’re such a selfish woman. Fine, I'll satisfy you with my mouth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマン地域で反撃戦の様子１
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Counterattack status in Helman region 1.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 追い詰められた魔軍はダウンホール作戦を実施
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cornered demon army implements the Downhole Operation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 小部隊により殺戮作戦
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Massacre operation by small units.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマン地域で反撃戦の様子２
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Counterattack status in Helman region 2.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 作戦を察知したヘルマン軍、参謀真田透琳
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Helman forces detect the operation, staff officer Torin Sanada.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 敵の作戦の裏をかく、この機会に魔軍を殲滅する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Outsmart the enemy's operation and annihilate the demon army on this opportunity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマン地域で反撃戦の様子３
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Counterattack status in Helman region 3.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍の作戦が開始された、村々が襲われる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army's operation begins, villages are attacked.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: が、真田の作戦で被害は最小限に抑えられていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, thanks to Sanada’s plan, damage was kept to a minimum.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アミトス、ロレックスの主力軍が出撃した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The main forces of Amitos and Rolex sortie.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマン地域で反撃戦の様子４
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Counterattack status in Helman region 4.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アミトス、ロレックスが次々の魔物陣地を攻略していく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Amitos and Rolex capture demon bases one after another.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物大将軍ルメイはそれでも当初の作戦を固持する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nevertheless, Demon Great General Lumei holds to the original plan.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマン地域で反撃戦の様子５
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Counterattack status in Helman region 5.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 侵攻してきた部隊を止める真田、そこにシーラが闘将を率いて現れた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sanada stops the invading unit; then Sheila appears leading the fighting generals.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、魔軍本陣にアミトス、ロレックス隊が迫っていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, Amitos and Rolex troops were approaching the demon army's main camp.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人破壊爆弾が届いた、迫った人類軍でなく都市に使う事にしたルメイ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The human-destruction bomb arrived; Lumei decided to use it on the city, not the advancing human army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマン地域で反撃戦の様子６
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Counterattack status in Helman region 6.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人破壊爆弾を使う為にエノラゲイと移動するルメイ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lumei moves with Enola Gay to use the human-destruction bomb.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、パットンに迎撃され倒される
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, Patton intercepts and defeats him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ついに魔軍を殲滅
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Finally, the demon army is annihilated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマンは解放された
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Helman has been liberated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 空飛ぶランス城
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The flying Lance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスと闘神ゼータの語らい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A conversation between Lance and the Fighting God Zeta.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もうひとつの闘神を拾いに行く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Going to pick up another Fighting God.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地図、ヘルマン東部
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Map, eastern Helman.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シグマが墜落した場所、中に入ります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The place where Sigma crashed, entering inside.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 闘神都市の中をうろうろ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wandering inside the Fighting God city.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うん、ちょっと懐かしいぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, this is a bit nostalgic.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 聖骸闘将との戦闘の前
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Before the battle with the Holy Corpse Fighting General.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 聖骸闘将との戦闘の後
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After the battle with the Holy Corpse Fighting General.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれらは壊れているので仲間に出来ない、無理
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are broken, so they cannot be recruited, impossible.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 動かずに埋まっているシグマを見つける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Find Sigma, motionless and buried.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今は何も出来ない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cannot do anything now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 宝箱だんごが聖櫃を運んでいる・・逃げて行く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The treasure chest dumpling is carrying the ark... it runs away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれがシグマ本体だ、捕まえられん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's the real Sigma; can't catch it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: また宝箱だんごを見つけるが・・逃げて行く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Find another treasure chest dumpling... it runs away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: くそっ、素早い。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Damn, it's fast.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やっぱりランスでも無理かと・・パットンが言ってしまうと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Patton says, 'As expected, it's impossible even for Lance...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 意地になるランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance becomes stubborn.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 宝箱だんごを見つける、慎重に近寄り飛びかかり捕まえる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Find the treasure chest dumpling, carefully approach, leap and capture it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やったーーー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Got itーーー!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス、それ違う、普通の宝箱だんごだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance, that's different, it's just a normal treasure chest dumpling.
